Uses of Class
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf.ConfigurationManager

  • Packages that use ConfigurationManager 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.normalizer
    The Region Normalizer subsystem is responsible for coaxing all the regions in a table toward a "normal" size, according to their storefile size.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver  

    • Uses of ConfigurationManager in org.apache.hadoop.hbase

      Fields in org.apache.hadoop.hbase declared as ConfigurationManager 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ConfigurationManager HBaseServerBase.configurationManager
      Configuration manager is used to register/deregister and notify the configuration observers when the regionserver is notified that there was a change in the on disk configs.
      Methods in org.apache.hadoop.hbase with parameters of type ConfigurationManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static void HBaseServerBase.setupWindows(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, ConfigurationManager cm)
      If running on Windows, do windows-specific setup.
